sn1.29:4.1: “Four are its wheels, and nine its doors;
sn1.29:4.2: it’s filled with greed and tied up;
sn1.29:4.3: and it’s born from a bog. Great hero,
sn1.29:4.4: how am I supposed to live like this?”
sn1.29:5.3: and having plucked out craving root and all:
sn1.29:5.4: that’s how you’re supposed to live like this.”
